page.title: 14Ashford Town Centre
page.content: Surrounded by a wide Ring Road where the traffic travels just one way round, stands the shopping centre. There is a wide variety of shops of all sizes. Recently a pedestrian only area has been built covered over by roofing. This is called the Tufton Centre. Cars to be parked in one of the many car parks and people can walk more safely from shop to shop. The main street is wide enough for an open market every weekend. The main library, bowls club, police station, a church and the Technical College all stand within the Ring Road. Some people travel out of town towards Chart to buy most of their food at a huge supermarket.
